availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Hansford Crabtree (McLean County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, farmer. McLean County, Kentucky, native. Married to Amanda F. Baird Crabtree in Daviess County, Kentucky, in August 1839. Father of Jemima Crabtree, Joanna Crabtree Moseley, William B. Crabtree, John Henry Crabtree, and Margaret Crabtree. Married to Elizabeth Iglehart Crabtree in Daviess County in April 1853. Father of Amanda M. Crabtree, James L. Crabtree, Fountain E. Crabtree, Marion Crabtree, and Lucinda Crabtree. Farmer in Daviess County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in McLean County in 1850. Farmer in McLean County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in McLean County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
